metadata.name: GENESIS MOOD #2
metadata.description: The Christofle NFT collection “925 Genesis MOOD” represents one of the best-sellers of the Maison: the iconic MOOD by Christofle launched in 2015. The MOOD appears at the heart of a fantastic imaginary city named 'Christofle Aurifaber Citatis'. The City of Christofle Silversmithing is a dreamlike city of silver and gold where the architecture takes the visitor on an immersive journey, beyond time and space, revealing the brand codes dear to Christofle.
